news_header: Aki Rahunen appointed CFO of Innofactor, starting by May 8, 2025.
news_text: The Board of Directors of Innofactor has appointed Aki Rahunen as the CFO of the Group, effective no later than May 8, 2025. Rahunen is currently the CFO of Avidly and has previously served as CFO of Fluido. He is also a member of Innofactor's Board of Directors. Rahunen expressed his enthusiasm for the new role, stating that he believes his diverse experience will help Innofactor continue its profitable growth.
